title: CSS and JavaScript - Creating a Single Page Flexbox Website
headline: Learn how to make an impressive one-page website using CSS Flexbox and JavaScript in this exciting free online course.
description: Open a world of opportunity and learn basic web development with this free online web development course. You will be taught how to design an effective, impressive, and responsive single-page website using a vast array of tools. The simple tutorials will cover the techniques, commands and methods for using CSS, Flexbox, JavaScript, and HTML to create and style a fully functioning, dynamic website from start to finish.
courseDescription:
Cascading Style Sheets (also known as CSS) is a simple design language used to layout and style a webpage to make it more attractive and presentable. Flexbox is a layout module and one of the most important parts of CSS. It is applied to control the dimension, order, and placing of items in the container. JavaScript is a text-based programming language that helps make a website more interactive. Learn how to combine these three elements with HTML to design and create a responsive and impressive single-page website in this free online web development course.

This web development tutorial will help you master the commands, tricks, and techniques of Flexbox, CSS, and JavaScript for building a single-page website. All the fundamentals and concepts are divided into simple and effective lessons. You will learn how to create dynamic components and sections of the website and be provided with some useful and valuable resources as downloadable files. By the end of this web development training, you will create a beautiful and responsive single-page website from scratch. 

Not only will this course allow you to learn JavaScript and CSS to create a fully functioning website, but it can set you up to make a career in web development. After understanding Flexbox properties, tools, and tricks, the rest of the content becomes very easy and easy to comprehend. Enrolling in this web development class can kickstart your exciting journey in website design and development whether you are a professional wanting to make a career change or a student studying web design hoping to learn technical website development skills.
